channel.title: Csharp on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Csharp on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: whoa
item.description: ever wondered how to make a One Atmosphere Plasmoid? me neither.. but I have wondered what happens when you put a bunch of stuff in to a microwave.. it seems nifty.. i am also going to start playing more scrabble… do you want to learn about C#?
